title: s3, I'll play with any bronze or silver who wants
body:
uhh so basically I wanted a bronze account so I could play with my lower ranked friends occasionally so I powerleveled to 30 and played my provisionals, but got placed in silver 3 somehow (check my match history it's actually pretty funny hahahaha http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/OC1/200647729 )

anyway, I thought I'd just throw the offer out there if anyone wants to play, I might not play too much on this account (and probably won't be _overly _ serious) but we should grab some pretty free wins hahaha

so yeah I'll play in any team in pretty much any role if you need me, probably better as something other than support so I can actually carry :   ^   )   I don't have too many champs atm but I'll probably just buy whatever is on sale and chill with them

just add me or comment below if ya want, idrm

ign: Crimson Hawk

oh, and I get a bit bossy if I'm really trying to win, so if we're playing and I start getting mad just listen or remind me that I'm here to have fun (>^.^)>

replies.body: I'm S5, mainly play mid and support, hmu if you're keen still.

Im conflicted, do i take the offer and get away from the mind numbing retardation that is b5.

Or do i retain my pride and not get boosted.
